title: New Runes coming out in S8
body: Are our runes going to just not exist anymore? If so what will happen, will we get refunded our IP? I want to know before I buy em.

replies.body: Fret not friends! We're going to be taking care of everyone who has bought runes in the past, and you're alright to continue buying runes for now as well. [**Riot Cactopus has made a very good thread**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/RlNQkO39-buying-runes-between-now-and-preseason) where they're discussing all the changes and compensation for those who have been vigorously spending their IP on runes.

Our runes will be sacrificed for the greater good, so that everyone may have a slice of the pie. Whether or not you get your IP back is one question, but another question is... what else will we spend our IP on? Possibly emotes? Possibly make more things available to purchase with IP? The world may never know... until it happens.
